data: My family had for centuries owned the same estate, handed down from father to son undiminished in size, and much increased in value.
The Cruise of the Mary Rose; Or, Here and There in the Pacific
Kingston, William Henry Giles, 1814-1880; Pearse, Alfred, 1855-1933 [Illustrator]
